extracted_clauses: (b) The Contractor's Expenses. Except as otherwise provided in this Agreement, each party shall bear its own expenses.
. -  Payment for Purchases and Work Done: Any materials, services, etc. Contractor has committed to deliver and perform.

3.5 Effect of Termination
Upon the date of termination, all Customer payment obligations accrued but not yet paid become immediately due.
evidence: Each party shall bear its own expenses, except as otherwise provided in this Agreement.
Section 7 of the contract is dedicated to Payment of Expenses.
Contractor has committed to deliver and perform payment for purchases and work done.
All Customer payment obligations accrued but not yet paid become immediately due upon termination.
